rows.label: qst002501_msg0001
rows.name:
Pleased to meet you, mo. I am
Fumufumu, a historian, mo.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0002
rows.name:
My dream is to see all the historical
buildings of Luxuria, mo.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0003
rows.name:
And this is my partner, a climber
of cliffs and ruin walls...

rows.label: qst002501_msg0004
rows.name: Mylak.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm not interested in the history of
buildings or ruins. If I can climb
it, that's all that matters to me.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0006
rows.name:
We're here to investigate
these ruins right now.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0007
rows.name: Did you know, mo?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0008
rows.name:
The royal capital, Theosoir,
is now located right up against
the ceiling of Genbu, mo.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0009
rows.name:
But long ago, the people of Luxuria
lived on the Genbu Drifts, mo.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0010
rows.name:
Due to the monsters living there and the
influence of the Cloud Sea, they gradually
moved their settlements upwards, mo.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0011
rows.name:
So they once lived in
these ruins too, mo.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0012
rows.name:
Though that was several
thousand years ago...

rows.label: qst002501_msg0013
rows.name:
Fumufumu, you're talking too much.
Let's move on to the next wall.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0014
rows.name: Be quiet and listen, mo.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0015
rows.name:
This is why I can't stand men who are all
muscle and no brains... Do you even
understand the value of these ruins, mo?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0016
rows.name:
I don't, and I don't care
about the ruins. More
importantly, let me climb a wall.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0017
rows.name:
That's it, mo! I'm breaking
up this partnership with you
wall-climbing idiot, mo!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0018
rows.name:
Hmph, it's no skin off my
back. You can't climb the
walls yourself, can you?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0019
rows.name:
You just sit on top of my
backpack all the time. You
think you can climb a wall?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0020
rows.name:
Hmph! Climbing is easy,
mo! Just watch me, mo!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0021
rows.name: Ah...

rows.label: qst002501_msg0022
rows.name: Mo-moooo!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0023
rows.name: Fumufumu!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0024
rows.name:
Damn it, he's in a pack of
monsters! I have to go help him...

rows.label: qst002501_msg0025
rows.name:
But I'm only good for climbing.
Getting to Fumufumu through
those monsters is...

rows.label: qst002501_msg0026
rows.name: Ugh, sorry. Please, save Fumufumu.
